```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, collapse = TRUE, comment = "#>")
```

+ **{magrittr}**'s `%>%` (pipe)
   - Linar operations
+ **{dplyr}**
   - `select()`
   - `filter()`
   - `mutate()`
   - `group_by()`
   - `summarize()`
   - Join/bind data frames
      - `left_join()`
      - `right_join()`
      - `full_join()`
      - `bind_cols()`
      - `bind_rows()`
+ **{tidyr}**
   - `gather()`
   - `spread()`
